### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace at position (42.0, -81.0)
-  Furnace at position (45.0, -80.0)
-  Furnace at position (40.0, -79.0)

### Iron plate storage at position (43.5, -82.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Chest at position (43.5, -82.5)
-  Chest at position (40.5, -80.5)
-  Chest at position (43.5, -81.5)
-  Chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)
-  Chest at position (2.5, 0.5)
-  Chest at position (0.5, 2.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before starting the mining process
-  Make sure the burner mining drill is placed correctly and has a clear path to the resource

### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt
-  Make sure the furnace is not full and has space to produce the output

### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure that the boiler has fuel before starting the process
-  Make sure the boiler is connected to a pipe and has a clear path to the steam engine

### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure that the steam engine has a clear path to the boiler and is connected to a pipe
-  Make sure the steam engine is not empty and has fluid in the connections

### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Ensure that the offshore pump is placed correctly and has a clear path to the water
-  Make sure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe and has a clear path to the boiler

### Errors when using pipe groups
-  Ensure that the pipe group is connected correctly and has a clear path to the destination
-  Make sure the pipe group is not empty and has fluid in the connections

### Errors when using electricity groups
-  Ensure that the electricity group is connected correctly and has a clear path to the destination
-  Make sure the electricity group is not empty and has voltage in the connections
